title.native: くノ一ツバキの胸の内
title.romaji: Kunoichi Tsubaki no Mune no Uchi
title.english: In the Heart of Kunoichi Tsubaki

description:
Deep in the mountains in the middle of nowhere lives a group of kunoichi called Akane Class. These kunoichi work hard together to improve their own skills, and they all live by an unbreakable rule: “Contact with men is strictly forbidden.” But everything takes an unexpected turn when Tsubaki, leader of one of the groups, starts experiencing strange feelings whenever the subject of men comes up.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

tags.name: Ninja
tags.description: Prominently features Japanese warriors traditionally trained in espionage, sabotage and assasination.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Primarily Child Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters below a high school age.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Feet
tags.description: Features the sexual depiction or stimulation of a character's feet.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Tanned Skin
tags.description: Prominently features characters with tanned skin.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Rural
tags.description: Partly or completely set in the countryside.

tags.name: Twins
tags.description: Prominently features two or more siblings that were born at one birth.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Gyaru
tags.description: Prominently features a female character who has a distinct American-emulated fashion style, such as tanned skin, bleached hair, and excessive makeup. Also known as gal.

tags.name: Slapstick
tags.description: Prominently features comedy based on deliberately clumsy actions or embarrassing events.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

title.native: くノ一ツバキの胸の内

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/udon0531) | [Pixiv](http://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=61937) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/udon05310531/) | [Tumblr](http://udon0531.tumblr.com/) | [Pawoo](https://pawoo.net/@udon122)

**Awards:**
- Honorable Mention, 27th Gessan Newcomer Awards
- Honorable Mention, 69th Newcomer Comic Awards

__[Blog (JP)](http://ameblo.jp/sira10/)__

__Birthplace:__ Toride City, Ibaraki Prefecture, Japan

__Yuusuke Shirato__ is a Japanese arranger, composer, lyricist and musician.

__Genres:__ Alternative rock, Pop rock
__Labels:__ Poppo Express - Epic Records Japan

[Official Site](http://thepeggies.jp/) | [Twitter](https://x.com/the_peggies) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC3jNmNbqOSajU-pT36HnTJA) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/the_peggies/) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/thepeggiesofficial) | [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@the_peggies_official) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_peggies) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_peggies)

*the peggies* was a Japanese all-woman rock band from Kawasaki, Kanagawa, Japan, formed in 2011.

On July 8, 2022, the band announced that they would be going on indefinite hiatus in September the same year, following the release of a best of compilation album *MMY* and final tour *"the peggies tour 2022 My White"* concluding on September 30, 2022.

__Members:__
• [Yuuho Kitazawa](https://anilist.co/staff/180282/Yuuho-Kitazawa) (vocals and guitarist, songwriter) • [Twitter](https://x.com/poppoexpress)
• Makiko Ishiwatari (bass) • [Twitter](https://x.com/mega_makiko)
• Miku Onuki (drummer) • [Twitter](https://x.com/minimiku0423)

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/吉原俊一郎)

Affiliated with studio Bihou.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/明田川仁)

Affiliated with Magic Capsule, a recording studio led by his father [Susumu Aketagawa](https://anilist.co/staff/120062).
Masaharu Yamanouchi is a music producer.
Representative director of [Aniplex](https://anilist.co/studio/17/). Board Director at [CloverWorks](https://anilist.co/studio/6222/CloverWorks).
